code: var dateFormatter=function dateFormatter(date){var d=new Date(date);var ye=new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en",{year:"numeric"}).format(d);var mo=new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en",{month:"short"}).format(d);var da=new Intl.DateTimeFormat("en",{day:"2-digit"}).format(d);return"".concat(da,"-").concat(mo,"-").concat(ye);};export default dateFormatter;
